author: DryRun
body: As @slava77 pointed out in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18841, there was a bug introduced that caused a plot to be filled with random values (Hcal/DigiTask/TimingCut/depth/*, for QIE11 channels; the timing is basically the charge-weighted average time slice). QIE11DataFrame::size() should be QIE11DataFrame::samples(); size() includes the digi header/footer, so the charge lookup was going past the last element of the vector storing the charge per time slice.
title: HCALDQM: bugfix, QIE11DataFrame::size() should be samples()
